sn17.35:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava rajagahe viharati gijjhakute pabbate acirapakkante devadatte.
sn17.35:1.2: Tatra kho bhagava devadattam arabbha bhikkhu amantesi:
sn17.35:1.3: “attavadhaya, bhikkhave, devadattassa labhasakkarasiloko udapadi, parabhavaya devadattassa labhasakkarasiloko udapadi.
sn17.35:2.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, kadali attavadhaya phalam deti, parabhavaya phalam deti;
sn17.35:2.2: evameva kho, bhikkhave, attavadhaya devadattassa labhasakkarasiloko udapadi, parabhavaya devadattassa labhasakkarasiloko udapadi.
sn17.35:3.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, velu attavadhaya phalam deti, parabhavaya phalam deti;
sn17.35:3.2: evameva kho, bhikkhave, attavadhaya devadattassa labhasakkarasiloko udapadi, parabhavaya devadattassa labhasakkarasiloko udapadi.
sn17.35:4.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, nalo attavadhaya phalam deti, parabhavaya phalam deti;
sn17.35:4.2: evameva kho, bhikkhave, attavadhaya devadattassa labhasakkarasiloko udapadi, parabhavaya devadattassa labhasakkarasiloko udapadi.
sn17.35:5.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, assatari attavadhaya gabbham ganhati, parabhavaya gabbham ganhati;
sn17.35:5.2: evameva kho, bhikkhave, attavadhaya devadattassa labhasakkarasiloko udapadi, parabhavaya devadattassa labhasakkarasiloko udapadi.
sn17.35:6.2: Idam vatvana sugato athaparam etadavoca sattha:
